CommandDefinition.Name: listconnectionpooltypes
CommandDefinition.Description: Lists all known connection pool types.
CommandDefinition.ExtendedDescription: Additional pool types can be registered by extending the abstract class com.gip.xyna.xnwh.pools.ConnectionPoolType. A jar-file with those pool type can then be placed in BLACK_EDITION_HOME/server/conpooltypes. The ConnectionPoolManagment will discover the new pool types during the next factory start.
